Created by  : user1
Email       : user1@abcxyz.com

Created date: _datetime_
"""

import pytest
import re

class TestDynamicGenTestScript:

    @pytest.mark.parametrize(
        ('test_data', 'pattern'),
        (

            (
                """First line
I have computer.
Other line
My friend has game console.
Another line ....
I don't have digital camera.
...
last line""",    # test data
                r"(?m)I +have +(?P<v1>\w+( +\w+)*)\.[^\r\n]*[\r\n]+([^\r\n]*[\r\n]+)*My +friend +has +(?P<v2>\w+( +\w+)*)\.[^\r\n]*[\r\n]+([^\r\n]*[\r\n]+)*I +don't +have +(?P<v3>\w+( +\w+)*)\."   # pattern
            ),
        )
    )
    def test_generating_script(self, test_data, pattern):
        result = re.search(pattern, test_data)
        assert result is not None
